                 int year)
          throws InvalidCallNumberException,
                 InvalidYearException,
                 InvalidTitleException

Standard constructor creates a referenc according to the specified type, call number, title, and publishing year

Parameters:
type - Reference's type (book or journal)
callNum - Reference's call number
title - Reference's title
year - Book's publishing year
Throws:
InvalidCallNumberException
InvalidYearException
InvalidTitleException

equals

public boolean equals(Reference otherReference)

Compares the call number, title, year, and either authors and publisher (for books), or organization (for journals) of a reference user is adding are identical with the same information of a reference already in the arrayList

Returns:
true if the call number, title, year, and either authors and publisher (for books), or organization (for journals) of the reference user is adding are identical, false otherwise

areCallNumbersEqual

public boolean areCallNumbersEqual(Reference otherReference)

Compares the call number of a reference user is adding with the same information of a reference in the arrayList

Returns:
true if the call number of the reference user is adding is identical, false otherwise

areTitlesEqual

public boolean areTitlesEqual(Reference otherReference)

Compares the title of a reference user is adding with the same information of a reference already in the arrayList

Returns:
true if the title of the reference user is adding is identical, false otherwise

areYearsEqual

public boolean areYearsEqual(Reference otherReference)

Compares the year of a reference user is adding with the same information of a reference already in the arrayList

Returns:
true if the year of the reference user is adding is identical, false otherwise

toFileString

public java.lang.String toFileString()

Converts the different components of the reference into a string to be stored in a file

Returns:
String containing the reference's call number, author(s), title, publisher name(s) and publishing year

addReference

public static java.util.ArrayList<Reference> addReference(java.util.ArrayList<Reference> referenceList,
                                                          java.lang.String refType,
                                                          java.lang.String tempCallNumber,
                                                          java.lang.String tempAuthors,
                                                          java.lang.String tempTitle,
                                                          java.lang.String tempPublisher,
                                                          java.lang.String tempOrganization,
                                                          int tempYear)

Creates a reference with user's specified call number, title, and year, as well as authors and publisher (for books) or organization (for journals). Attempts to add the reference to the referenceList if it is not found there already

Returns:
arrayList containing the newly created reference, as well as all the other references in the system

searchReferences

public static java.lang.String searchReferences(java.util.ArrayList<Reference> referenceList,
                                                java.lang.String refType,
                                                java.lang.String tempCallNumber,
                                                java.lang.String tempTitle,
                                                int startYear,
                                                int endYear)

Searches for references based on the user's specified type, title keywords, start year, and/or end year

Returns:
String containing the references that match the users search query

useHashMapToSearch

public static java.lang.String useHashMapToSearch(java.lang.String searchType,
                                                  java.lang.String tempCallNum,
                                                  int startYear,
                                                  int endYear,
                                                  java.lang.String[] tempTitle,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<Reference> referenceList,
                                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> titleIndex)

Method that performs the search for references using the titleIndex hash map instead of sequentially. Once references are found, they are printed out, just like in the sequential search procedures contained within the main method.
